html:
11.1.21  5:16 am   damien, why is everything so dumb and stupid?

      due to intelligence

11.1.21  4:34 am   What do you imagine Pablao Rectangles would taste like

      bland

11.1.21  3:58 am   Are there any secret messages in ur songs?

      every conceivable thing in the universe is a secret message

11.1.21  1:37 am   Why does you saying normal sound so good in more than a dream?

     normal is the best word. there's nothing i can do about that

     (also more than a dream is the first time you've ever used to word normal (i think))

     it feels like the millionth time, but shockingly i just checked and it seems to be the first time in a song release. i was actually afraid of the backlash i would get for having used it too many times already. but maybe i was just thinking of the questions page and other textual writings

11.1.21  12:30 am   will you run for president in 2024?

      no





PREVIOUS QUESTIONS

10.31.21  11:37 pm   were the lines about dreams in i'm a princess foreshadowing more than a dream ? 

      no

10.31.21  11:15 pm   How do you play the spoons?

      just make a pile of spoons

10.31.21  11:06 pm   Are you in the illuminati?

      i have a guest pass

10.31.21  11:01 pm   thoughts on paper?

      that sounds lovely

10.31.21  10:39 pm   If you could add any letter to the English alphabet, what would it be? (Could be an already existing character, or a completely new one)

      how about θ, for the "th" sound

10.31.21  9:30 pm   i had a dream with "long long long journey" in it, but the lyrics were switched around and the melody was changed. now I forgot how it went, but was it somehow intentional that your song's cousin or sibling got into my dream?

      that's just mother nature at play

10.31.21  6:34 pm   What's your favorite song of yours? Or anything in general.

      i'm not done doing them

10.31.21  5:47 pm   how many things are there

      1. everything is the same thing

10.31.21  5:25 pm   what should i wear today?

      everything

10.31.21  4:51 pm   did you make your next song about fear because of halloween?

      no. that reminds me, one of my new fears is that people will think that

10.31.21  2:10 pm   what are your thoughts on thinking?

      it's like another world, in your mind!

10.31.21  1:30 pm   why do I look ugly?

      due to too much beauty

10.31.21  1:20 pm   how's your mental state?

      dynamic. like a typical workplace environment

10.31.21  7:58 am   What did you learn while you were gone?

      i've never been gone

10.30.21  9:53 pm   What is the chord that hits when the text on the screen "wow"appears in the "chorus with a twist", as you called it earlier, in your song "more than a dream"?

      Emin9(11)

10.30.21  9:40 pm   Is there anything you need help with right now?

      i'm sure i could think of something

10.30.21  9:34 pm   Is it ever hard to wrap your head around how many people listen to your songs?

      yes

10.30.21  9:14 pm   are you currently attempting a 2 week schedule?

      no, but it's one of my long standing goals and i hope to do it soon

10.30.21  7:48 pm   do you know how to play dominos?

      no

10.30.21  7:29 pm   why do you always say "of what" when someone asks "is the world a simulation?"

      i'm wondering what they are suggesting the world could be a simulation of. like if someone asked me "is an apple simlar" i might say .... "similar to what"

10.30.21  7:18 pm   did you quit writing songs forever?

      no. i'm just getting started

10.30.21  7:10 pm   Are Peeping Tom and Doubting Thomas the same person? 

      no

10.30.21  6:33 pm   do you wish there were a lower case version for numbers

     no

     and if there were would u mostly use lower case numbers lolololol

      i'd use the normal one that most people use. this is part of a broader strategy to communicate effectively with other people

10.30.21  4:18 pm   Is cheese a paradox?

     no

      The more cheese i have the more holes it has. But more holes means i have less cheese?

     no

10.30.21  3:42 pm   have you ever read catcher in the rye?

      i might have read part of it

10.30.21  3:09 pm   how do you get ideas?

      tape spaghetti to the wall

10.30.21  2:16 pm   how often do you incorporate dreams into your songs?

      i've only actually done it twice, and both times it was a melody

10.30.21  1:57 pm   Why does everyone hate me 

      you might be too powerful

10.30.21  1:00 pm   does the next song feature mind-bending Mellotron shreds and earth-shattering punk yodeling

      no

10.30.21  11:47 am   Are you smart?

      yes but that doesn't necessarily mean i'm smart

10.30.21  10:17 am   What was the glitch in your old video editor?

      hmm.... there was this thing where if you fill a sequence with too many items, things start to turn bright green

10.30.21  9:10 am   Will the the next song have the word "without"?

      no

10.30.21  8:52 am   thoughts on books?

      i like the part where you get to turn the page

10.30.21  7:08 am   if life is a journey, what are journeys? 

      trips

10.30.21  4:14 am   do you believe in time

      yes

10.30.21  4:05 am   hey bill what do you want for christmas?

      a new year

10.30.21  12:41 am   what is more than words? 

      maybe a picture

10.29.21  11:29 pm   When new video

      pretty soon

10.29.21  11:03 pm   what are you doing for halloween? 

      nothing, but during halloween i will be working on a song recording

10.29.21  8:30 pm   are bad jokes bad

      let me perform some calculations

10.29.21  4:27 pm   is normal interesting

      put it this way, interesting is normal

10.29.21  4:23 pm   thoughts on everything bagels?

      too many things on them

10.29.21  4:02 pm   how and why did you choose music as your main artform out of all the others?

      i don't remember

10.29.21  3:39 pm   is life a myth

      it's one of the true myths

10.29.21  3:35 pm   what do you do when your not making videos?

      make music to go with the videos. or make music for videos to go with
